member.name: T:Nancy.ViewEngines.Nustache.NustacheViewEngine
member.summary: View engine for rendering nustache views.

member.name: M:Nancy.ViewEngines.Nustache.NustacheViewEngine.RenderView(Nancy.ViewEngines.ViewLocationResult,System.Object,Nancy.ViewEngines.IRenderContext)

member.name: P:Nancy.ViewEngines.Nustache.NustacheViewEngine.Extensions
member.summary: Gets the extensions file extensions that are supported by the view engine.
member.remarks: The extensions should not have a leading dot in the name.
